channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- Drive Composer entry
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- Drive Composer entry

item.title: CVE-2022-31217|2024-08-03T07:11:39.867Z -- abb -- drive%20composer%20entry
item.description: Vulnerabilities in the Drive Composer allow a low privileged attacker to create and write to a file anywhere on the file system as SYSTEM with arbitrary content as long as the file does not already exist. The Drive Composer installer file allows a low-privileged user to run a "repair" operation on the product.
